title: 3 Steps to Change Your Age & Birthday on Discord

steps.title: Go to the submit a request page in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to the submit a request page in a web browser. You can use any web browser on a computer, phone, or tablet. To complete this process, you will need an image of you with a government-issued ID (that also lists your birthdate) as well as a piece of paper with your Discord tag on it (it's similar to "username#1234"). It's important that all of this information is submitted in a single picture (the ID in one hand and the paper with the Discord name in your other hand). Use features like the timer or a selfie stick to take a picture without your hands .

steps.title: Enter your email address.
steps.content: Enter your email address. This needs to be the email address that you use with your Discord account.

steps.title: Select Appeals, age update, other questions.
steps.content: Select Appeals, age update, other questions . You'll see this next to the "How can we help" question. Changing this changes the form of the next question. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select Update age information.
steps.content: Select Update age information . It's next to the "Appeals, age update, other questions" header. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Add optional information (if you want to).
steps.content: Add optional information (if you want to). This includes checking the box and looking at the Community Guidelines as well as entering your phone number, which you'll need to do if you signed up using your phone number.

steps.title: Enter your birthdate.
steps.content: Enter your birthdate. This should reflect the birthdate listed on the form of ID you plan to submit.

steps.title: Click the confirmation box .
steps.content: Click the confirmation box . A check in the box means that you are confirming that you have a single picture that includes yourself, a government-issued ID that also lists your birthdate, and your Discord tag.

steps.title: Enter a subject.
steps.content: Enter a subject. You can enter something like "I need help with my age update request."

steps.title: Enter a description.
steps.content: Enter a description. Add something like "I entered the wrong date of birth originally and need to update it."

steps.title: Add your photo.
steps.content: Add your photo. Click Add File or drop your file in the box. [3] X Research source Everything including your ID, your face, and your Discord name should be clear and easy to read.

steps.title: Click Submit.
steps.content: Click Submit . It may take Discord up to a few days to get back in touch with you via email about your request application. If the picture is blurry or difficult to read, it might be rejected.
